div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 786 Goljamo Čočoveni, c. 20 km. E of Sliven, Bulgaria, 1965 Burial: c. 325-310 B.C. (T) Contents: 2 AV, 100 AE. Pot hoard Philip II: 2 AV fr. (fulmen type) Philip II and Alexander III: 100 AE Disposition: Sliven Gerasimov, BIAB 29 (1966), p. 212
